data.text: «Gè ɓɔɠɔ yɛni ná, naati ti wooɠula mà,
Yeenɔpɛ ka zèe maalegai la nuɓusɛiti ma ti la ɠoloni,
Nuɓusɛiti be ti la ɓesu zìiɠaawana vai ʋa,
Ta ɗa zei kabaiti saama, ti ɗa gɔvɛiti gaazaɠa,
Ta nu ta ɠomina, ti ɠɛ ma:
Kɛlɛ gè ti-ziɛ ʋelei pɛ sɛʋɛa,
ʋɔɔma ta ti-mɛmɛwolani tɔnɔi.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Nà mavofodai ɠula Zakɔɓe ná-nuɓusɛiti su, ta Zuda wolodai,
Salon nɛmɛi ɠa ɠɛ ga tufa lɛnugi,
Kɛlɛ wɔiti wo ɠɛlɛzu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa,
Nà ʋaazu ga boɠa zɔkpɔi wo ʋɔ,
Naa ɠa é ba, Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Nà-botiɠɛ nuiti ta wooɠula ga koozunɛɛi,
Wo-laaseigi ɠa yɛ nà-nuiti da, gè yiimazeɠeai ga tiye,
Zooi ɠa, niiti ta ɠɛ pɔ, ti tuya loo ɓɔɠɔ ʋɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ nà ʋaazu geeɠɔlɔ niinɛi ɓɛtɛzu ta zou niinɛi,
À ɠoozunɛ tɔun,
Nà ɠoozunɛ nà ɓɔɠɔi Zeluzalɛme ná-faa zu,
Nu la mɔ doungo ɠaa náʋɛ
Ta pɛlɛiti to, ti yɛ ti wu,
Ti la mɔ pɛlɛiti toga ga
Ti la mɔ ɓɔlɔa wafuun,
Aisa ti ʋa wooɠula mà,
Zuluɓui ta baala ziʋoi ta ɠɛ tufai miizu ada ɠila,
